p.span: The Long Hill Township School District is one of the best school districts in the state of New Jersey. Our district has the privilege of educating and supporting the students and families of Gillette, Homestead Park, Millington, Meyersville and Stirling in grades Preschool through Eight. We pride ourselves with caring and nurturing teachers and administrators who instill a love of learning in our students...

td.style: width: 100%; text-align: center; vertical-align: middle; border-top: 1px none rgb(0, 30, 90);

span.br: Long Hill Health Related Closure Website

br.span: Classroom resources, COVID-19 information, and superintendent communications for Parents/Guardians during the closure.
Important information and communications regarding COVID-19
Our Padlet is a public message & image board for our community to help stay connected!
Parents are able to sign up to receive important emergency alerts via email, phone, and web.

p.span: Tiger Talk is the student created school newspaper for Central Middle School. For the first time in 54 years it is now digital and can be read online!
